typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	versionAsOf: 2,
	container: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'delta2') ~> source1
